animeDescription: Several short animated mini-stories based on the short stories and four-panel manga of Keiko Fukuyama, including My Father the Mouse, The Rabbit Brothers, Summer Secret, The Mysterious Fairy, How Very Strange, and Kuro.   (Source: Anime Encyclopedia)
animeStaff: [['Fujino Sadayoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Takarano Arika', ['Inserted Song Performance']], ['Watanabe Toshiyuki', ['Music']], ['Fujita Tsutomu', ['Background Art']]]
